name: Armaldo
author: Kazuaki Aihara
flavor_text: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.

poke_body.name: Fossil Armor
poke_body.effect: If Armaldo would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack’s damage done to Armaldo if that damage is 60 or less.

attacks.name: Crush Claw
attacks.effect: During your next turn, if an attack does damage to the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 40 more damage.
